name: Global uniques
uniques: Free [Worker] appears <upon founding a city> <when [Great city] Victory is enabled>
Triggers a [Free day] event <upon turn start> <when [Free day] Victory is enabled>
Rebel units may spawn <when [Friend of the barbarians] Victory is enabled>
Gain an extra spy <when [The direction of civilization] Victory is enabled>
Reveals the entire map <when [Open start] Victory is enabled>
[All] units gain the [Random Promotion] promotion <upon turn start>
unitUniques: Gain control over [all] tiles in a [0]-tile radius <upon turn end> <when [Go go go] Victory is enabled>
